school_name: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
comments: Chef is an awesome teacher. He has a ton of experiences which he discusses making the courses interesting. Not the most organized, but if you\'re interested and participate, you\'ll do well

school_name: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
comments: Chef Brown is a fun professor and is very laidback. As long as you pay attention and keep up with your assignments you will pass. I thought I had a B in the class and ended up with an A!

school_name: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
comments: Unorganized, Dont expect to know your grade until it pops up on genie.. pointless class. horrible teacher he belongs in the feild

school_name: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
comments: Very knowledgeable. Everything comes STRAIGHT from the book, even the quiz and test questions and all his power points, so as long as you study that you\'ll do very well. there are lots of assignments, but all of them are pretty easy.

school_name: University of North Carolina at Greensboro
comments: Chef Brown should be just that, a Chef. Obviously he has never taught before because I have never had a professor go an ENTIRE semester giving multiple assignments..and have about 2 quizzes and 1 or 2 tests handed back...EXTREMELY unorganized, not helpful. Won\'t answer emails. Messed up my final grade, didn\'t have any assignments or grade to show.
